name: postscript
content:

(abbreviation PS) a short remark or message added to the bottom of a letter after you have signed your name, usually introduced by the abbreviation PS: There was the usual romantic postscript at the end of his letter - PS I love you.
any written or spoken addition to something already finished: As a postscript to that story I told you last week, it turned out that the woman was his sister-in-law.
